problems.title: Airway Blocked Message
problems.description: The LCD screen shows an animation of a blockage even after cleaning the filter.
possible_causes: Hidden dust inside the built-in crevice tool
solution_steps: Remove the wand and check the built-in dusting and crevice tool for lint.
Tap the HEPA filter firmly to dislodge fine dust.
Ensure the filter is 100% dry (48 hours).

problems.title: Battery Run Time Low
problems.description: Vacuum doesn't last 70 minutes as advertised.
solution_steps: Switch to Auto or Eco mode.
The Gen5 battery is click-in and can be swapped easily.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Gen5detect / Gen5outsize?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $547 vacuum, and extending the life of your Dyson is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Gen5detect / Gen5outsize needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Gen5detect / Gen5outsize myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
